shell.name: HWCLOCK
shell.enable: /sbin/hwclock --hctosys ${configuration_program_options_hwclock} && echo -n 'feedback|notice|time read from hardware clock' || echo -n 'feedback|warning|failed to read time from hardware clock'
shell.disable: /sbin/hwclock --systohc ${configuration_program_options_hwclock} && echo -n 'feedback|notice|time saved to hardware clock' || echo -n 'feedback|warning|failed to save time to hardware clock'
